roleset.name: stick to
roleset.note: Based on sentences in temprel data. Comparison to adhere.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Grossly , [the mass-1] extends into the mucosa , muscle , and pericolonic fat , and is also adhesed [*-1] to a 29.0 cm segment of terminal ileum.
example.arg: to a 29.0 cm segment of terminal ileum.
